pages.text: Hello, $(thing)$(playername)$()! This page will introduce you into Elemental Amulets mod! $(br2)First, you need to do some mining! To find $(item)Elemental Shards$() They can spawn underground between ~40 - ~20 Y coordinates! In this example it spawned in the mineshaft next to the iron ore

pages.title: Alternative Method
pages.text: You can also smelt it into shards, if you found $(item)Elemental Ore$() block
Obtain elemental shards! $(br2)To move forward you will need elemental shards!
